section.title: Data category 01
section.para: Used to specify ELABORATE... See references for further details.

listitem.para: Writers must use md01:attribute_01 to express the Module 01 data category 01 data category in DMLex Instances.
See the Module 01 data cetegory 01 Annotation for the normative usage description of this attribute and the following sections for further details on structural and inline elements.

section.title: Structural objects
section.para: A provision related to use in structural objects.

example.title: Creation of data category 01 at structural levels

section.title: Inline objects
section.para: Use the data category 01 attributes on the specified inline marker object:

section.title: data category 01 annotation
section.para: This is used to express inline the Module 01 data category 01 data category.

example.title: Example of Enriching with the data category 01 annotation
